Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A black wooden torch sits here. You see an instruction label on the handle.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a beautiful, but very worn, tapestry. The colors and fabrics used were woven with delicate care.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small crypt

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small crypt sitting next to the fence here. The walls are weather-stained, and the door is hole-ridden. Etchings used to cover the walls, but now little remains to be seen.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small tomb

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Rising from the ground here, you see a small tomb dedicated to some unknown person. The door, as with the rest of the foundation, is constructed of hewn granite. All are weather-beaten now.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Under the shading branches of the tree sits a crypt. The walls are stained with the passage of time, and the door as well. The latter, however, bears a strange symbol: three interconnected rings.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden bucket

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wooden bucket here, half full of dirt. It lies tipped over down in the grave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large shovel protrudes from a pile of dirt here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Set into a stone platform in the center of the room is a sarcophagus. The lid is open, revealing a skeleton dressed in fine (but rotting) clothing.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: leather-bound book

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Clutched within the skeleton's hands is a leather-bound book. The cover is remarkably well preserved and bears many glowing runes.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You glimpse a solitary tombstone, about five feet in height, rising amongst the trees.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dragon's treasure hoard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dragon's treasure is here, consisting mostly of broken bits of glass and small worthless trinkets.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crystal goblet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a fine crystalline goblet here. Its workmanship is exquisite, and it is probably worth a lot.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large chest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large chest sitting in the corner of the chamber, sheathed in cobwebs. It is closed and appears to be locked.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: weathered map

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a weathered map of the surrounding area. The thing is old and almost crumbles as you touch it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: empty bottle

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bottle with the label "TODO" on the front. Unfortunately, it is empty.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: steel gauntlet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You've found a pair of steel gauntlets. Funny, you never saw these back in Marcos' shop.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wine cask

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old wine cask here, bound with iron bands. It was abandoned a while ago, yet the cork is still intact.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: beholder's treasure hoard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see, strewn all across the floor, the treasure hoard of the beholder. Most of the stuff is junk, useless personal effects.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crimson cloak

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have found a cloak, colored crimson red. Interwoven in with the fabric are tiny strands of a metallic substance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: gold piece

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find 75 gold pieces scattered about in the dust.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pouch containing stones

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find a small pouch containing some precious stones: three emeralds, two small rubies and a single diamond.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: griffin egg

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large egg, possibly measuring a foot in diameter. It is colored brown, with light blue splotches.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large nest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large nest, possibly 10 feet in diameter, sits on the ledge here. It is made mostly of sticks and grass, but several bones and shredded flesh are evident interwoven into the structure.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large fountain

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large fountain, made of expertly crafted black marble, sitting against the back wall. A grotesque face, carved about five feet up, squirts from its mouth a constant stream of water into the basin.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pile of gold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pile of gold coins at the bottom of the fountain. Apparently, it was once used as a wishing well.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden throne

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the stump of a tree which has been carved into a wooden throne.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: book of runes

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a faintly glowing manuscript, bearing the title "TODO".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: fence rod

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long iron fence rod lying on the ground here. It was apparently broken off from the others.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large mace

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large mace here, with a leather-bound grip.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Dubro's maul, a long oaken stick with a ball and chain attached. Looks pretty lethal.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Joque's claymore, a long two-handed sword with many intricate carvings engraved into the blade and hilt.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long dagger here, lying on the ground. It appears to be a stabbing weapon - the point is sharp, but the blade is dull.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ancient parchment

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old piece of parchment, inscribed upon which is some writing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large sword, probably a cutlass, lying on the ground here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: buried casket

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Half buried in the hole is a large casket, which is currently closed.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crumbling skeleton

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a skeleton, partially clad in rotting clothing, lying in the pine box.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bronze cross

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Clutched in the skeleton's bony hands is a finely constructed one-foot tall cross made from tarnished bronze.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lying next to the bucket is a coil of rope.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old lantern, battered by many years of use. It still appears functional, however.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some water.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead tanglewoode

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The walnut tree has been hacked down, and lies before you dead.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead forest bloodnettle

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You've succeeded in smashing down the forest bloodnettle.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: cloak and cowl

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: All that remains of the dark hood is its soil-brown cloak and cowl.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead whip weed

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The whip weed has been hacked to pieces, and lies before you now.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: smashed armor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You've broken the suit of its magical enchantment and, in the process, smashed the various pieces all across the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead pocket dragon

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The pocket dragon lies dead on the ground. Its body has sustained many wounds.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: red wine

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a puddle of red wine on the ground here. This one seems less viscous than the first.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead saberclaw

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You survey the dead saberclaws sprawled out before you, lying in forming pools of blood.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: jade debris

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have destroyed the jade statues. Most have been reduced to dust and splinters; however, one seems salvageable as a series of jade chunks.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead beholder

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The beholder lies on the floor here, its immense "head" split open from your attacks.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead giant crayfish

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The giant crayfish has been reduced to a pile of crawdad meat, encased in a battered shell.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead giant scorpion

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The gaint scorpion lies before you, missing several legs, and its life as well.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead griffin

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The griffin falls and dies, a victim of your anxiety.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead small griffin

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You dispatch the small griffins with minimal effort, and just a twinge of guilt.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Jaldi'al the lich's remains

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A smashed skeleton in robes, the former housing for the spirit of Jaldi'al, lies in a heap before you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead jungle bekkah

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fearsome jungle bekkahs have been slain. Once the epitome of grace, beauty and power they now lie stretched out before you, bloody and matted.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Reginald's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The body of Reginald lies on the ground here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dubro's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Dubro, now hewn down at your feet.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Joque's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The mighty Joque has now been slain, and lies on the ground.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Trevor's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Trevor lies dead on the ground here. A pool of blood has already begun to form.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
